A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As soon as the movie was over and the credits appeared I was extremely disappointed. Turning SW into a Marvel Comedy meanwhile this is supposed to be the 'Darkest Film' out of the Saga yet? Yeah what a joke literally\, Revenge of the Sith still is. Besides that\, this movie makes me appreciate and value The Prequels so much more considering all the hate they got over the years. Good job ruining what TFA established and all the hype it left for this movie to answer. Disney's version of Luke Skywalker though was depressing. Complete disrespect to George Lucas's Star Wars.
